document.full_text: a tanker truck loaded with 8,000 gallons of fuel exploded on friday morning in oklahoma city when it collided with a car driven by a teenage girl on her way to school, fire officials said.
document.title: escape from fiery oklahoma crash called "miraculous"
lines_and_colors: a tanker truck loaded with 8,000 gallons of fuel exploded on friday morning in oklahoma city when it collided with a car driven by a teenage girl on her way to school, fire officials said.
